name: iTRONYC
tag_list: engineering, hardware-design, hardware-development, prototyping, schematic-design, pcb-design, manufacturing, electric-engineering
overview:
iTRONYC Inc. does engineering in hardware and software, including prototyping, also offering design and engineering services for third-party companies. Their business is focused on market sectors in IT, consumer electronics, biomedical, audio and video processing, data storage, data distribution, renewable energy, clean-tech, avionics, aeronautics, aerospace, industrial control and automotive.

iTRONYC Inc. offers the complete hardware design, from the conceptual stage or any technical specification, schematic design, pcb design with signal integrity, hardware debug, design verification, testing and documentation.
